name: FreestylersWorld (V8) - Black Theme
description:
An external design for FreestylersWorld gaming forum written on pure CSS/CSS3, most elements have been re-designed and the theme itself provides an exclusive content for every user, especially VIP's.
More information at changelog (additional info).
additional_info:
v1.3.1 (17/10/2017):
- Pushed an update to support the compatibility of all browsers.
- Fixed logout button size.

v1.3.0 (17/10/2017):
- Limitation of signatures size is now removed and will display the full resolution without pixel breaking.
- Changed the design of the advanced posting, posting permissions and forum info.
- Replying buttons have been re-designed.
- Thank, report & reply with quote icons have been changed.
- Thread icons have been changed (open/locked/hot).
- Completely re-designed the user CP page.
- Fixed PM list pixel breaking.
- Added sparkles animation on the "Welcome, username!" message at the navigation bar.
- Removed stacked borders on active private messages.
- Changed the color of the footer.
- Having more than 100 private messages will no longer pixel break (bug).
- Moderation panel is now stacked on the chatbox to the left side instead of floating on the middle screen (bug).

v1.2.1 (15/10/2017):
- Changed the color of tools menu.
- Completely changed the thread design.
- Adjusted several positions.
- Made small changes the the left user side by changing some colors.
- Avatars are now round supporting max size of 250x250.

v1.2.0 (13/10/2017):
- Changed the colors of every usergrade.
- Added dynamic HTML color checking for every usergrade including the active users.

v1.1.0 (12/10/2017):
- Made avatars round both on login & threads.
- Adjusted the size of the avatars so the pixels don't break out of the body element.
- Removed animation from header.
- Re-colored navbar buttons.
- Added new forum heads, title and row images.
- Completely modified the chatbox.
- Added glowing effect to the search box on hover and when active.
- Removed the info/settings chatbox buttons.
- ZChat notification (ding sound) is now hotpink instead of yellow.

v1.0.2 (11/10/2017): 
- Added new font.
- Changed a few colors of the table body.
- Changed the max width of the wrapper.
- Made the body responsive-friendly.

v1.0.1 (10/10/2017):
- Changed background image.
- Made adjustments of the navbar, removed some inline styles for better looking.
- Removed logout border on hover as it looked like 3D effect.
- Added logout animation on hover.
- Changed logo size for better pixel quality.
- Removed the whole header/navbar backgrounds/images.
